items.content_html: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
items.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate:  A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.

items.title: maxnowack/blend: Simple dependency management without Git submodules

items.content_html: A modular, lightweight, and headless solution.
items.title: szhsin/react-autocomplete: A modular, lightweight, and headless solution.

items.content_html: TypeNexus is a great tool for API encapsulation and management. It offers a clean and lightweight way to bundle TypeORM + Expressjs functionality, helping you to build applications faster while reducing template code redundancy and type conversion work.
items.title: jaywcjlove/typenexus: TypeNexus is a great tool for API encapsulation and management. It offers a clean and lightweight way to bundle TypeORM + Expressjs functionality, helping you to build applications faster while reducing template code redundancy and type conversion work.

items.content_html: A lightweight, web-based automation tool designed to simplify repetitive tasks for small teams and individuals. It focuses on ease of use, offering essential features like API integration, simple workflows, and execution monitoring without the complexity or high cost of other solutions.
items.title: TAGCH/Workflow-Automation: A lightweight, web-based automation tool designed to simplify repetitive tasks for small teams and individuals. It focuses on ease of use, offering essential features like API integration, simple workflows, and execution monitoring without the complexity or high cost of other solutions.

items.content_html: A lightweight and customizable starter kit for building TypeScript libraries. It comes with ESM support, flexible configuration options, extensive ESLint rules, and built-in Github Actions integration.
items.title: 2BAD/ts-lib-starter: A lightweight and customizable starter kit for building TypeScript libraries. It comes with ESM support, flexible configuration options, extensive ESLint rules, and built-in Github Actions integration.

items.content_html: A lightweight flexible Dependency Injection library for use with TypeScript projects.
items.title: morganstanley/needle: A lightweight flexible Dependency Injection library for use with TypeScript projects.

items.content_html: Vectors is a lightweight, high-performance vector math library designed for use in browser-based games and applications that require vector manipulation
items.title: kayibea/vectors-ts: Vectors is a lightweight, high-performance vector math library designed for use in browser-based games and applications that require vector manipulation

items.content_html: Livio is a modern social network that connects people to discuss topics of politics, daily life, and culture. With a lightweight and user-friendly design using Astro and React, Livio facilitates meaningful interaction and the exchange of ideas on an accessible platform optimized for dynamic experiences.
items.title: leoneldonati/livio-web: Livio is a modern social network that connects people to discuss topics of politics, daily life, and culture. With a lightweight and user-friendly design using Astro and React, Livio facilitates meaningful interaction and the exchange of ideas on an accessible platform optimized for dynamic experiences.

items.content_html: A React / React Native client for BLEST (Batch-able, Lightweight, Encrypted State Transfer), an improved communication protocol for web APIs which leverages JSON, supports request batching by default, and provides a modern alternative to REST.
items.title: jhuntdev/blest-react: A React / React Native client for BLEST (Batch-able, Lightweight, Encrypted State Transfer), an improved communication protocol for web APIs which leverages JSON, supports request batching by default, and provides a modern alternative to REST.

items.content_html: LLRT (Low Latency Runtime) is an experimental, lightweight JavaScript runtime designed to address the growing demand for fast and efficient Serverless applications.
items.title: awslabs/llrt: LLRT (Low Latency Runtime) is an experimental, lightweight JavaScript runtime designed to address the growing demand for fast and efficient Serverless applications.

items.content_html: This middleware helps to restrict the number of requests a client can make within a given time period. It's ideal for lightweight use cases and can be easily extended with in-memory, Redis, or MongoDB as storage options. https://www.npmjs.com/package/@canmertinyo/rate-limit-express
items.title: c4nzin/rate-limiter-express: This middleware helps to restrict the number of requests a client can make within a given time period. It's ideal for lightweight use cases and can be easily extended with in-memory, Redis, or MongoDB as storage options. https://www.npmjs.com/package/@canmertinyo/rate-limit-express
